known_issues: Tracking system is not working in the live/production environment.

existing_features.title: Make the 'Track' button on the NGO Alert screen perform a real action by navigating to a dedicated tracking view (new route) that displays the current pickup/tracking status for the most recent food post.
Persist the client-side food posts store so that History, NGO Alert, and the new tracking view continue to work after a page refresh in the live/production environment.
